mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS worked_days, SUM(work_hours) AS total_hours, SUM(overtime_hours) AS overtime_hours FROM attendance WHERE emp_loginId = #{userId} AND record_date BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') + 6

SELECT CASE WHEN AVG(MIN_MINS) IS NOT NULL THEN LPAD(FLOOR(AVG(MIN_MINS) / 60), 2, '0') || ':' || LPAD(FLOOR(MOD(AVG(MIN_MINS), 60)), 2, '0') ELSE '00:00' END AS averageCheckIn FROM ( SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.start_time, 'HH24')) * 60 + TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.start_time, 'MI'))) AS MIN_MINS FROM activity a JOIN attendance t ON a.attendance_id = t.attendance_id WHERE a.activity_type = '출근' AND t.emp_loginId = #{userId} AND a.start_time BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') + 6 GROUP BY TRUNC(a.start_time) )

SELECT CASE WHEN AVG(MAX_MINS) IS NOT NULL THEN LPAD(FLOOR(AVG(MAX_MINS) / 60), 2, '0') || ':' || LPAD(FLOOR(MOD(AVG(MAX_MINS), 60)), 2, '0') ELSE '00:00' END AS averageCheckOut FROM ( SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.end_time, 'HH24')) * 60 + TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.end_time, 'MI'))) AS MAX_MINS FROM activity a JOIN attendance t ON a.attendance_id = t.attendance_id WHERE a.activity_type = '퇴근' AND a.end_time IS NOT NULL AND t.emp_loginId = #{userId} AND a.end_time BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') + 6 GROUP BY TRUNC(a.end_time) )

SELECT MAX(CNT) AS consecutive_days FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT work_date, work_date - ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY work_date) AS grp FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT TRUNC(record_date) AS work_date FROM attendance WHERE emp_loginId = #{userId} AND check_in_time IS NOT NULL ) ) GROUP BY grp )

SELECT total_days, used_days, remaining_date, CASE WHEN expired_date <= LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) || '-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN remaining_date ELSE 0 END AS expiring_this_year FROM EMPLOYEE_ANNUAL WHERE parent_emp_id = ( SELECT emp_code_id FROM employee WHERE emp_loginId = #{userId} ) AND year = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)

SELECT e.emp_name AS empName, TO_CHAR(a.start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS tripDate, '출장지' AS location FROM activity a JOIN attendance t ON a.attendance_id = t.attendance_id JOIN employee e ON t.emp_loginId = e.emp_loginId WHERE a.activity_type = '외근' AND TRUNC(a.start_time) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT e.emp_name AS empName, TO_CHAR(u.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS leaveDate, t.type_code AS type FROM LEAVE_USAGE u JOIN LEAVE_TYPE t ON u.type_id = t.type_id JOIN employee e ON u.employee_id = e.emp_code_id WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN TRUNC(u.start_date) AND TRUNC(u.end_date) AND TRIM(UPPER(u.approval_status)) = 'APPROVED'

SELECT e.emp_name AS empName, d.dept_name AS deptName FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.emp_dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.emp_loginId NOT IN ( SELECT emp_loginId FROM attendance WHERE TRUNC(record_date) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) )

SELECT e.emp_name AS empName, d.dept_name AS deptName, ROUND(SUM(a.work_hours), 1) AS workHours, ROUND(SUM(a.overtime_hours), 1) AS overtimeHours FROM attendance a JOIN employee e ON a.emp_loginId = e.emp_loginId JOIN department d ON e.emp_dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE TRUNC(a.record_date, 'MM') = TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND a.overtime_hours > 0 GROUP BY e.emp_name, d.dept_name ORDER BY overtimeHours DESC
SELECT dept_id, dept_name FROM department ORDER BY dept_id ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(a.record_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS workDate, a.emp_name AS empName, a.dept_name AS deptName, TO_CHAR(a.check_in_time, 'HH24:MI') AS checkInTime, TO_CHAR(a.check_out_time, 'HH24:MI') AS checkOutTime, a.work_hours AS workHours, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT a.record_date, e.emp_name, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time, a.work_hours FROM attendance a JOIN employee e ON a.emp_loginId = e.emp_loginId JOIN department d ON e.emp_dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.dept_id = #{deptId} ORDER BY a.record_date DESC ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{offset} + #{size} ) WHERE rnum > #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE_ANNUAL ( leave_id, parent_emp_id, year, total_days, used_days, remaining_date, expired_date ) SELECT EMPLOYEE_ANNUAL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, e.emp_code_id, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE), ar.leave_days, 0, TO_CHAR(ar.leave_days), TO_DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) || '-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM employee e JOIN ( SELECT years_of_service, leave_days FROM ANNUAL_RULE WHERE emp_code IS NULL ) ar ON ar.years_of_service = TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, e.HIRE_DATE) / 12) WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM EMPLOYEE_ANNUAL ea WHERE ea.parent_emp_id = e.emp_code_id AND ea.year = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) )
